Title: Authorizes the city of New York to discontinue the use as parkland and alienate certain land within Flushing Meadows Corona Park
Summary: Authorizes the city of New York to discontinue the use as parkland and alienate certain land within Flushing Meadows Corona Park.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to discontinue certain parkland in Flushing Meadows Corona Park in the borough of Queens currently consisting of asphalt parking lots to allow for a new development with at least twenty acres of parkland
